app_descript:
Microsoft Azure

Brief: Microsoft Azure is a comprehensive cloud platform designed to help you manage and deliver services seamlessly from anywhere. This mobile application complements the massive Azure online services suite, offering convenient access to cloud resources, managing virtual machines, web apps, databases, and more, directly from your mobile device.

Price: ğŸ’µ The Microsoft Azure app is free to download, but using Azure services will incur costs according to the pricing of the individual services you use. Pricing details can be found on the official Microsoft Azure pricing page.

Please note that the Microsoft Azure mobile app is intended as a companion tool for the Azure cloud platform, and effective use of the app assumes the user already has an Azure account and services set up.
